info.name: Complete API Collection
info.description: Auto-generated complete API collection with all modules

item.name: Get a specific user by ID
Public user details (allow guest), apply rate limit
Mark all messages in a chat as read
Note: Raw body parsing is handled at app level for webhook routes
Payment history route for poster, tasker, super admin
Retrieve current intent and client_secret by bidId
Toggle bookmark (add if not exists, remove if exists)
Get all bookmarks of the current user
Mark a single admin notification as read
Mark all admin notifications as read
Get all active subjects (for students/tutors to see available subjects)
Get all subjects with filtering, searching, pagination
Delete subject (soft delete - sets isActive to false)
Get all applications with filtering, searching, pagination
Mark applicant as tutor (Final approval - Phase 3)
Get available interview slots (Applicants see only AVAILABLE)
Get trial requests matching tutor's subjects
Expire old trial requests (Cron job endpoint)
Generate monthly billings for all students
Generate tutor earnings for all tutors
Initiate Stripe Connect payout to tutor
Get most popular subjects by session count
Get top tutors by sessions or earnings
Get top students by spending or sessions
Get user growth statistics by month
Create a new review for a completed session
Get tutor's reviews (public only, or all if admin)
Get active participants of a call
Get or create whiteboard for a call
